reviews.review:
We could be in a full blown post-nuclear apocalypse where we resort to cannibalism and skulk around in the dark like cockroaches and Drippy's would still be full.

10/10 this game ascends time and space
best game graphics are best and funny chat
its like tf2 but everyone playing is a wise 30 year old and i like it that way
better than tf2 medic has shotgun
The best grenade simulator I've ever played.
y es igual que el 2 pero con poligonos (?
Is good. 10/10 good game. Would recommend

Pretty fun, the communities on these older Valve games seem so much better than the newer ones. Just some people having a good time and playing by the rules, nobody being obnoxious or toxic and there's nobody trying to be a friendly poodis when everyone is just trying to do the objective. It's just some simple fun.
This is boring in my opinion just like tf 2 exept it's not free. though i got it in a bundle for cheap so no problem.
This game has fun, intense action. But could have more balancing between classes.

This game might have been good for it's time but I don't think it really aged well.  4/10

For the feel of shooting it doesn't connect for me it feels like I am rolling a dice, because I am unsure if i'm actually hitting someone or I am shooting at wall. The maps are great, but the only map that's really good is classic 2fort.
The classes feel all over the place when I played I don't know if it's the server but it feels like one class with a bunch of
weapons you can give them. If you like classic shooters you can give it a try.
Game is shit, only buy if part of the valve complete pack
It's a realy fun game. The best game i ever Played
if your pc is shitty then yes you can play this game because you will be able to play with 40fps.

Team Fortress Classic is a Pretty Good Game. Maps Like Dustbowl And Well Are Really worth it.
For The Price of This Game its A Good buy, There Are Servers With Players And Some with Bots to Fill in The Gaps, Despite The Age of This Game. People use A Program From The Tools Section of The Library To Host a Dedicated Server For Their Own Room. Fast Paced Action And Good Teamwork FPS.
gungun but the sequel but a bit more cartoony BUT older and not as cartoony and definitely not a sequel
If you played TF2 or you you like old games,mabye even both. You will indeed want to get this game.
The game may be old, but it's still fun if you want to play the game with friends. You might need a 3rd party plugin so you can play with bots.

I still play it today and still have the same amount of fun! I find todays very sophisticated fps games lack that old-school "deathmatch feel" like TFC. If you are like me and wanna play like in the golden days p2p, feel free to join:

https://steamcommunity.com/groups/tfcrevival
old but gold even though both games are dead
Still playing this 21 years after its release, best game ever!

If you played it back in the day you're still going to love it. And if you didn't, well you're still going to love it because it's such a perfectly balanced game with a strong focus on mechanics that you will have loads of fun. Plain and simple, it's just that good and tightly executed.
dont buy it, just play tf2
this game is really good and for some reson i'm better at being sniper in TFC then TF2
you probably shouldn't get this game because TF2 is free but if you really want to play it then go ahead
Well its the Classic. you know
Has a lot of cool MUG Moments
Let's be honest, 100% of people who has this game got it from the half-life collection.
Kinda hard to get the hang of, but really fun once you do.
pretty good, maybe better than tf2 but im not sure. maybe worth it on sale I got this with the half life complete pack

Team Fortress 2 is better in just about every way. The only reason I would recommend this nowadays is for nostalgia or curiosity, and given that this game has no bot support and not very well populated servers nowadays, unlike the original Counter-Strike and Source for example, it doesn't even do a good job of that.

It's not a bad game per se; it's just been surpassed and left behind.
omfg this game is very good ! I can't wait for TF2 Brotherhood of arms :D !!!
Bom jogo para passar o tempo
y does this even cost money lmfao
The gameplay is just average, and since the graphics are terrible and the game costs money, you'd be better off playing Team Fortress 2 (which is free).
I dont have is game and is very fun
un classico para divertirse un buen rato
THE definitive multiplayer shooter. If you prefer Counter-Strike over this you're probably gay.
pyro is fucking op as hell

In my ongoing and likely futile effort to write a Steam review for every game in my library (#270 out of 612)... it's time for Team Fortress Classic.

With Team Fortress 2, there's not exactly a lot of reason to go back to the original game. It's still here, though, and still good--and, if nothing else, its simplicity and rough-around-the-edges nature has its own kind of charm.
its fun! buy this game. BUY IT!
Love this game. Brings back memories.... to bad there isn't much community backing this classic game, but there are still servers running to bring you back.
